original: @ga /@#/_/so so 'brang ba chen mo'i sgrub thabs/🔽@@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma ha pra ti sa ra sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/
analyzed: @ga /@#/_/so so 'brang ba chen mo'i sgrub thabs/ @@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma ha pra ti sa ra sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/
translated: The Great Protection Sadhana🔽In Sanskrit: Mahapratisarasa dhana🔽In Tibetan: So so ’brang ba chen mo’i sgrub thabs

original: so so 'brang ba chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma so so 'brang ba chen mo la
analyzed: so so 'brang ba chen mo'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma so so 'brang ba chen mo la
translated: Homage to the Noble Great Protectress!

original: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por rnal 'byor pas/_sems mnyam par gzhag par🔽gyur pas snying gar pam yig yongs su gyur pa las sna tshhogs pad+ma/_de'i steng du a
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por rnal 'byor pas/_sems mnyam par gzhag par gyur pas snying gar pam yig yongs su gyur pa las sna tshhogs pad+ma/_de'i steng du a
translated: First, the yogi, having settled the mind in meditative equipoise,🔽visualizes at the heart a variegated lotus arising from the transformation of the syllable pam,

original: yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la pre yig ser po rnam par
analyzed: yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la pre yig ser po rnam par
translated: upon which is a moon mandala arising from the transformation of the syllable a. Upon that is a yellow pre syllable,

original: bkod pa la de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang /_byang
analyzed: bkod pa la de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang /_byang
translated: from which light radiates, inviting the gurus, buddhas, and bodhisattvas.

original: chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par bskul zhing gdan drangs nas mdun du
analyzed: chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par bskul zhing gdan drangs nas mdun du
translated: Having invited them, they are

original: stan sna tshhogs pa la nye bar bzhugs te/_phyag 'tshhal ba dang /_mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang /_bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_gsum
analyzed: stan sna tshhogs pa la nye bar bzhugs te/_phyag 'tshhal ba dang /_mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang /_bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_gsum
translated: offerings, confession of negative actions, rejoicing in merit,

original: la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_bsod nams
analyzed: la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_bsod nams
translated: going for refuge to the Three Jewels, generating the awakening mind,

original: yongs su bsngo ba dang /_bzod par gsol ba rnams bya'o/_/de nas byams pa🔽so so 'brang ba chen mo'i sgrub thabs/
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba dang /_bzod par gsol ba rnams bya'o/_/de nas byams pa so so 'brang ba chen mo'i sgrub thabs/
translated: dedicating merit, and requesting forbearance.🔽Then you should cultivate loving kindness,

original: dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms rnams bsgom par bya
analyzed: dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms rnams bsgom par bya
translated: compassion, joy, and equanimity.🔽Recite “Oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ” and meditate on

original: ste/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko\u0f85_ham/_zhes brjod nas stong pa🔽nyid du rnam par bsgom mo/_/de nas skad cig gis rang gi sems zla ba la
analyzed: ste/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko\u0f85_ham/_zhes brjod nas stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgom mo/_/de nas skad cig gis rang gi sems zla ba la
translated: emptiness.🔽Then, in an instant, visualize your mind as a yellow pre syllable🔽standing on a moon.

original: gnas pa'i pre yig ser po rnam par bsgoms la/_de yongs su gyur pa las so so
analyzed: gnas pa'i pre yig ser po rnam par bsgoms la/_de yongs su gyur pa las so so
translated: That completely transforms into a yellow

original: 'brang ma sku mdog shin tu ser ba rin po che'i cod pan can/_ser po dang / dkar po dang /_sngon po dang /_dmar po'i zhal bzhi dang ldan pa/_spyan
analyzed: 'brang ma sku mdog shin tu ser ba rin po che'i cod pan can/_ser po dang / dkar po dang /_sngon po dang /_dmar po'i zhal bzhi dang ldan pa/_spyan
translated: The form of Amṛtakuṇḍali is very yellow, with a jeweled crown, and has four faces—yellow, white, blue, and red.

original: gsum pa/_phyag brgyad pa/_phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang /_rtshe gsum pa dang /_mda' bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon pa
analyzed: gsum pa/_phyag brgyad pa/_phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang /_rtshe gsum pa dang /_mda' bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon pa
translated: He has three eyes, eight arms, and in his right hands he holds a sword, a chakram, a spear, and an arrow.

original: rnams kyis zhags pa dang /_dgra sta dang /_gzhu dang /_rdo rje rnams
analyzed: rnams kyis zhags pa dang /_dgra sta dang /_gzhu dang /_rdo rje rnams
translated: In his left hands he holds a lasso, an ax, a bow, and a vajra.

original: bsnams pa'o/_/pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa/🔽rin po che'i rgyan sna tshhogs pas brgyan pa rnam par bsgom mo/_/de'i spyi bo dang / mgrin pa dang /_snying ga dang /_nye ba'i snying ga rnams su zla ba la gnas
analyzed: bsnams pa'o/_/pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshhogs pas brgyan pa rnam par bsgom mo/_/de'i spyi bo dang / mgrin pa dang /_snying ga dang /_nye ba'i snying ga rnams su zla ba la gnas
translated: He stands in the dancing posture on a lotus and moon seat.🔽He is adorned with various jeweled ornaments.

original: pa'i dkar po dang /_dmar po dang ser po dang nag po rnams te/_om ahpr-i
analyzed: pa'i dkar po dang /_dmar po dang ser po dang nag po rnams te/_om ahpr-i
translated: On his crown, throat, heart, and navel are white, red, yellow, and black letters on moon seats.🔽Om ah pra

original: hum zhes pa'i yi ge rnams rnam par bkod la sngags 'di brjod nas bdag nyid lha🔽mo'i skur byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de nas rang gi snying ga'i 'od zer rnams
analyzed: hum zhes pa'i yi ge rnams rnam par bkod la sngags 'di brjod nas bdag nyid lha mo'i skur byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de nas rang gi snying ga'i 'od zer rnams
translated: Having arranged the syllables of the mantra, one should bless oneself into the body of the goddess.

original: kyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams yang dag par bskul nas gdan drangs te
analyzed: kyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams yang dag par bskul nas gdan drangs te
translated: Then, having invoked Akshobhya and so forth with light rays from one’s heart,

original: dbang bskur ba blangs nas cod pan gyi bdag po mi bskyod par bsam par bya'o//
analyzed: dbang bskur ba blangs nas cod pan gyi bdag po mi bskyod par bsam par bya'o//
translated: having received the empowerment, one should imagine Akshobhya as the lord of the crown.

original: de nas rang gi snying ga las mchod pa'i lha mo rnams yang dag par spros nas mchod
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying ga las mchod pa'i lha mo rnams yang dag par spros nas mchod
translated: Then, having emanated the offering goddesses from one’s heart,

original: pa dang bstod pa rnams byas nas yi ge brgya pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/_/ji
analyzed: pa dang bstod pa rnams byas nas yi ge brgya pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/_/ji
translated: having made offerings and praises, one should recite the one-hundred-syllable mantra.

original: srid du ngal bar ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o/_/sems ngal bar
analyzed: srid du ngal bar ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o/_/sems ngal bar
translated: One should meditate for as long as one does not become tired; when one’s mind becomes tired, one should recite the mantra.

original: gyur na sngags bzlas par bya'o/_/om ma ni d+ha ri badzi ni ma ha pra ti sa re hu~m hum
analyzed: gyur na sngags bzlas par bya'o/_/om ma ni d+ha ri badzi ni ma ha pra ti sa re hu~m hum
translated: Om mani vajri maha prati sara hum hum

original: phat phat swa ha zhes so/_/hu~m hu~m phat phat ces pa'i sngags bral bar yang ngo /🔽om badzra satwa sa ma ya_/_ma nu pa la ya/_badzra satwa twe no pa tish+tha/_dr-i d+ho me b+ha wa/🔽su tosh+yo me b+ha wa/_su po_me b+ha wa/_a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/_sarba sin+tim me pra yatsh+tshha/
analyzed: phat phat swa ha zhes so/_/hu~m hu~m phat phat ces pa'i sngags bral bar yang ngo / om badzra satwa sa ma ya_/_ma nu pa la ya/_badzra satwa twe no pa tish+tha/_dr-i d+ho me b+ha wa/ su tosh+yo me b+ha wa/_su po_me b+ha wa/_a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/_sarba sin+tim me pra yatsh+tshha/
translated: Also without the mantras hūṃ hūṃ and phaṭ phaṭ.

original: sarba karma su tsha me tshit+tam she yaku ru hum ha ha ha ha hoh_ga
analyzed: sarba karma su tsha me tshit+tam she yaku ru hum ha ha ha ha hoh_ga
translated: Oṃ vajrasattva samayam anupālaya vajrasattva tvenopatiṣṭha dṛḍho me bhava sutoṣyo me bhava anurakto me bhava supoṣyo me bhava sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha sarvakarmaṣu ca me cittaṃ śreyaḥ kuru hūṃ ha ha ha ha hoḥ bhagavān vajrasattva samayastvaṃ maṃ

original: ga wan sarba ta tha ga ta
analyzed: ga wan sarba ta tha ga ta
translated: Translation: Phat phat svāhā.🔽Also without the mantras hūṃ hūṃ and phaṭ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajrasattva samayam anupālaya vajrasattva tvenopatiṣṭha dṛḍho me bhava sutoṣyo me bhava anurakto me bhava supoṣyo me bhava sarvasiddhiṃ me prayaccha sarvakarmaṣu ca me cittaṃ śreyaḥ kuru hūṃ ha ha ha ha hoḥ bhagavān vajrasattva samayastvaṃ maṃ

original: badzra ma me mu_ny+tsha badzi wa ma ha sa ma ya satwa pha /_yi ge brgya pa'o/_/langs
analyzed: badzra ma me mu_ny+tsha badzi wa ma ha sa ma ya satwa pha /_yi ge brgya pa'o/_/langs
translated: The hundred-syllable mantra.

original: pa'i dus su dam tshhig la mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas bzod par gsol bar
analyzed: pa'i dus su dam tshhig la mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas bzod par gsol bar
translated: At the time of rising, having made offerings and so forth to the commitments, one should request forbearance.

original: bya'o/_/so so _'brang ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: bya'o/_/so so _'brang ma chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//_//
translated: The sādhana of Mahāmaṇḍala is complete.🔽Tantra

original: rgyud/    redu mig
analyzed: rgyud/    redu mig
translated: Eye

analyzed: da/  dpe gzhi/_ze darga/_za :na/_snar phar/_za na/
translated: Example

translated: Basis
